title: Incorrect Exit Code for Transfer Limit Exceeded

milestone.title: Help Wanted
milestone.description:
Enhancements which might be useful, but currently aren't planned.

Any help doing these much appreciated.

body:
<!--

Welcome :-) We understand you are having a problem with rclone; we want to help you with that!

If you've just got a question or aren't sure if you've found a bug then please use the rclone forum:

    https://forum.rclone.org/

instead of filing an issue for a quick response.

If you think you might have found a bug, please can you try to replicate it with the latest beta?

    https://beta.rclone.org/
    
If you can still replicate it with the latest beta, then please fill in the info below which makes our lives much easier.  A log with -vv will make our day :-)

Thank you

The Rclone Developers

-->

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

Incorrect Exit Code by rclone when the specified max-transfer limit is reached. As per the docs @ https://rclone.org/docs/#exit-code, the exit-code should be `8` instead of `7` which indicates a fatal error.

This is just my guess from a brief overview of the related code, but I believe that the error stems from https://github.com/ncw/rclone/blob/7d70e9266446901e93a888212edd06765821047b/fs/sync/sync.go#L178-L183 where the actual error is added to which fails the eventual comparison test for the error type.


#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

```
rclone v1.47.0-062-g99bc013c-beta
- os/arch: linux/amd64
- go version: go1.12.5
```


#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)

`Debian 9 64-bit`


####  Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)

`Google Drive`


#### The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

`rclone sync Drive: DriveCopy: --tpslimit=5 --tpslimit-burst=50 --max-transfer=700G`


#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

Relevant Lines:

```

2019/05/16 07:54:40 INFO  : Google drive root '': Waiting for checks to finish
```
